objects.text: Energy Efficient | Sapphire Blue | 2 Star Rating

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description: Brand: Whirlpool. Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Capacity: 184 litres. Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year. Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres. Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres. Bottle Count: 4. Installation Type: Freestanding. Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Form Factor: Stand Alone. Special Features: Adjustable Shelves. Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z. Voltage: 220. Wattage: 205 Watts. Number of Drawers: 4. Defrost System: Automatic. Door Orientation: Left. Door Material: Stainless Steel. Shelf Type: Wire. Number of Shelves: 2. Certification: Energy Rating. Material: Stainless Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd. Plot No. A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800. Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 count. Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a central product display of a refrigerator set against a dynamic gradient background. At the top center, the brand name is prominently displayed using the "heading" text layer, followed by a descriptive subtitle beneath it handled by the "subheading" layer. The refrigerator image, centrally aligned, is managed via the "product_image" layer and is enhanced by a radial glow for emphasis. Below the image, the main feature is highlighted using the "tagline" text, supported by additional attributes in the "description" layer. Pricing is displayed boldly in the "price" layer, accompanied by a call-to-action text “SHOP NOW” within a yellow rectangle using the "cta_background" and "cta" layers.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Indigo: `#1A237E` (Background primary)
- Steel Blue: `#303F9F` (Secondary gradient)
- Snow White: `#FFFFFF` (Text and icons)
- Soft Lavender: `#E0E0FF` (Subtext elements)
- Sunshine Yellow: `#FFD54F` (Price & CTA background)
product_color: The product image showcases a Whirlpool refrigerator with a visually striking and elegant dark blue gradient finish. The primary color is a deep navy blue (#0D0A4A) that blends smoothly into a lighter purplish-blue tone (#706C8D) at the edges, creating a subtle yet dynamic gradient effect. White (#FFFFFF) is used boldly for icons and text, offering high contrast and excellent readability while reinforcing the concept of coolness and freshness. The harmonious blend of cool hues and the sharp white overlay effectively highlights functionality and brand quality. This color palette can be used to create a clean, modern, and attention-grabbing advertisement banner.
